about_the_game:
Help a baby named Red and a soldier named White navigate their industrial, mutant-infested world in this narrative platformer.

Play as both characters simultaneously, using White's powers to enter mutants and control them from within. But watch out! Baby Red is vulnerable to the mutants, and must be 'gently' tossed to safety. Don't worry, he likes it.

Enjoy gorgeous hand-drawn visuals from Felix Colgrave and Zoe Medcraft of Wombot Studio, and a catchy soundtrack from Colin Spencer.

Don't worry, Red. I'm going to bring you home.

name: Red and White Demo
